thread.title: Detroit Lions agree to terms with former Falcons LB Paul Worrilow
thread.title_full: Detroit Lions agree to terms with former Falcons LB Paul Worrilow

author: Nate Atkins | natkins@mlive.com
title: Detroit Lions agree to terms with former Falcons LB Paul Worrilow
text: DETROIT -- The Detroit Lions made a headliner move Wednesday to bolster their offense, and now, they've found a little help for the defense, too. Detroit has agreed to terms with free-agent linebacker Paul Worrilow. He's the second outside player...
